attributes.action: make it illegal for any public figure either in the government or in media to tell a lie or to distort the truth in anyway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make it illegal for any public figure either in the government or in media to tell a lie or to distort the truth in anyway, if they do, the offending person or persons should be taken to the nearest town centre, put in stocks and pelted with rotten eggs.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
